title: Aurora: Secrets behind Reality
description: Perhaps sometimes you catch yourself wondering why you’re stuck to live in this ordinary world without magic wands, superhero abilities, or at worst, vampire friends.Perhaps you seek substitutes for these amazing adventures unlikely to happen in this dull reality chasing uber-trendy things, swooning over boys, and being like others.If you do, then we have very much in common, at least until recently.Because you know one day my life was changed.That day when I got involved into my friend’s love affair, I found out the reality was much more thrilling than any artificial world ever invented.Far more…
author: Marina Latcko
